mapper.insert: insert into SF9(sf9_name, sf9_birth, sf9_insta) value(#{sf9_name}, #{sf9_birth}, #{sf9_insta})
mapper.select: select sf9_no, sf9_name, sf9_birth, sf9_insta from SF9
select sf9_no, sf9_name, sf9_birth, sf9_insta from SF9 where sf9_name = "영빈"
select sf9_no, sf9_name, sf9_birth, sf9_insta from SF9 where sf9_no = 1
SELECT c.career_no, c.career_name, c.career_role, c.career_date, s.sf9_name, c.file_no from Career c LEFT JOIN SF9 s ON s.sf9_no = c.sf9_no where s.sf9_no = #{sf9_no}
